data.description: The scope of this document is limited to the Reference Release Definition of LwM2M PORTFOLIO OBJECT according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.

This document defines the technical specification for an Object to be used in conjunction with the Lightweight M2M enabler in order to extend the data storage capability of other Object Instances in the system. Moreover, such data extension MAY come with the support of new functionalities as strong data authentication (which confidence can be granted to a data likely to represent a personal ID).
